metadata.title: CVE-2017-15922 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
In GNU Libextractor 1.4, there is an out-of-bounds read in theEXTRACTOR_dvi_extract_method function in plugins/dvi_extractor.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15922` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

extract - 1:1.3-4+deb9u3build0.16.04.1
libextractor3 - 1:1.3-4+deb9u3build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libextractor package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.3-4+deb9u3build0.16.04.1').
